KnowledgeItem.Title: JiraWorkflowModifyIssue
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for updating issue in Jira by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding DataBlocks in the Issue.

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock JiraWorkflowModifyIssue and triggers the workflow for successful completion.

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks
			   TargetMachine=${JWMI:TargetMachine}      
			   TargetState=Created
			   Lib=CURLPUT
			   Key=${JWMI:IssueKey}
			   ToolUrl='${JWMI:JiraUrl}'
			   CurrentState=ReadState
			   ToolUser=${JWMI:JiraUser}
			   ToolPasswd=${JWMI:JiraPassword}
			   PutData='{"fields":{"summary":"${JWMI:Summary}","description":"${JWMI:Description}"}}'
			   TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
			   ContentType='Content-Type:application/json'/>
			   </NewBlock>
